channel.title: Arrows -- #6 -- (Still no success)
channel.description:
6TH topic now on this.. Still no helpful replies :P...
Problem: When i range my enemy, some times the arrow decides to shoot at different players.. (Just teh arrow(Not the hit) flies random ways... I've been told to use a different index.. If thats correct, can someone point out where im supposed to be looking..? I was looking for about 2 hours yesterday and found quite alot..
What i dont want to see:
Please dont post if your post is not ontopic, or not helpful.. People have been posting "Dude this is the 6th topic you've made YOUR GETTING NO WHERE! GIVE UP!"..
Or any type of spam-.-...
Please, helpful posts only.
Apreciated. Thnx
